data.title: Visitation & Funeral Information
data.meta_description: Read the obituary of Robert E. Scholes (1937 - 2010). Leave your condolences and send flowers to the family to show you care.
data.text:
Robert "Bob" E. Scholes, 72, of Malvern passed away Tuesday, February 23, 2010 at Hot Spring County Medical Center. Bob was born April 29, 1937 in Ashdown, Arkansas to Harold and Ninette (Stuart) Scholes. He retired from Malvern Water Works... View Obituary & Service Information

Share a Memory Below

A comforting word from you means a lot.

Share a Memory
